body: Portable altars are typically made of wood and are ornately carved and decorated with the religious iconography of a specific religion. The top of the altar lifts up, and items such as candles, incense, and oil can be stored within. These altars are modest, but give traveling priests a center from which to say their daily prayers, perform minor rituals, or preach to an assembled crowd.
name: Portable Altar
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Tools and Skill Kits/Portable Altar
